trans-unit.source: The following code, if included in a page at the root of a site, would apply to exactly the same pages as the example above. Remember the scope, when included, uses the page's location as its base. Alternatively, if this code were included in a page at example.com/product/description.html, the scope of './' would mean that the service worker only applies to resources under example.com/product. If I needed to register a service worker on example.com/product/description.html that applied to all of example.com, I would leave off the scope as above.
trans-unit.target: 如果下面的代码包含在网站根目录的页面中，则将与上面的示例完全相同。请记住，范围包括在内时，将页面的位置用作其基础。或者，如果此代码包含在 example.com/product/description.html 的页面中，则 './' 的范围表示服务工作者仅适用于 example.com/product 下的资源。如果我需要注册一个服务人员 example.com/product/description.html 适用于所有的 example.com ，我想撇下范围同上。

Assuming a standard US QWERTY layout, registering "KeyW" ensures that "W", Shift+"W", Control+"W", Control+Shift+"W", and all other key modifier combinations with "W" are sent to the app. The same applies to for "KeyA", "KeyS" and "KeyD".

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you'd use a bound key range. Here we declare a keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.bound("A", "F"); — a range between values of "A" and "F". We open a transaction (using IDBTransaction) and an object store, and open a Cursor with IDBObjectStore.openCursor, declaring keyRangeValue as its optional key range value. This means that the cursor will only retrieve records with keys inside that range. This range includes the values "A" and "F", as we haven't declared that they should be open bounds. If we used IDBKeyRange.bound("A", "F", true, true);, then the range would not include "A" and "F", only the values between them.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了如何使用绑定键范围。在这里，我们声明一个 keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.bound("A", "F"); —介于“ A”和“ F”之间的范围。我们打开一个交易（使用 IDBTransaction ）和对象存储，并打开一个游标 IDBObjectStore.openCursor ，宣布 keyRangeValue 作为可选键范围值。这意味着光标将只检索键在该范围内的记录。此范围包括值“ A”和“ F”，因为我们尚未声明它们应为开放边界。如果我们使用IDBKeyRange.bound（“ A”，“ F”，true，true）;，则范围将不包括“ A”和“ F”，仅包括它们之间的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you'd use a key range. Here we declare keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.upperBound("F", "W", true, true); — a range that includes everything between "F" and "W" but not including them — since both the upper and lower bounds have been declared as open (true). We open a transaction (using IDBTransaction) and an object store, and open a Cursor with IDBObjectStore.openCursor, declaring keyRangeValue as its optional key range value.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了如何使用键范围。在这里，我们声明 keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.upperBound("F", "W", true, true); —一个范围包括“ F”和“ W”之间的所有内容，但不包括它们—因为上限和下限均已声明为open（ true ）。我们打开一个交易（使用 IDBTransaction ）和对象存储，并打开一个游标 IDBObjectStore.openCursor ，宣布 keyRangeValue 作为可选键范围值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you'd use a key range. Here we declare a keyRangeValue as a range between values of "A" and "F". We open a transaction (using IDBTransaction) and an object store, and open a Cursor with IDBObjectStore.openCursor, declaring keyRangeValue as its optional key range value. This means that the cursor will only retrieve records with keys inside that range. This range includes the values "A" and "F", as we haven't declared that they should be open bounds. If we used IDBKeyRange.bound("A", "F", true, true);, then the range would not include "A" and "F", only the values between them.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了如何使用键范围。在这里，我们将 keyRangeValue 声明为介于“ A”和“ F”之间的范围。我们打开一个交易（使用 IDBTransaction ）和对象存储，并打开一个游标 IDBObjectStore.openCursor ，宣布 keyRangeValue 作为可选键范围值。这意味着光标将只检索键在该范围内的记录。此范围包括值“ A”和“ F”，因为我们尚未声明它们应为开放边界。如果我们使用IDBKeyRange.bound（“ A”，“ F”，true，true）;，则范围将不包括“ A”和“ F”，仅包括它们之间的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you'd use a lower bound key range. Here we declare keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.lowerBound("F", false); — a range that includes the value "F" and everthing after it. We open a transaction (using IDBTransaction) and an object store, and open a Cursor with IDBObjectStore.openCursor, declaring keyRangeValue as its optional key range value. This means that the cursor will only retrieve the record with the key value "F" and all that come after it. If we used IDBKeyRange.lowerBound("F", true);, then the range would not include "F"; only the values after it.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了如何使用下限键范围。在这里，我们声明 keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.lowerBound("F", false); —一个范围，其中包含值“ F”及其后的所有内容。我们打开一个交易（使用 IDBTransaction ）和对象存储，并打开一个游标 IDBObjectStore.openCursor ，宣布 keyRangeValue 作为可选键范围值。这意味着光标将只检索键值为“ F”的记录及其后的所有内容。如果我们使用 IDBKeyRange.lowerBound("F", true); ，则范围将不包含“ F”；只有它后面的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you'd use an only key range. Here we declare a keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.only("A"); — a range that only includes the value "A". We open a transaction (using IDBTransaction) and an object store, and open a Cursor with IDBObjectStore.openCursor, declaring keyRangeValue as its optional key range value. This means that the cursor will only retrieve the record with the key value "A".
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了如何使用唯一键范围。在这里，我们声明一个 keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.only("A"); —仅包含值“ A”的范围。我们打开一个交易（使用 IDBTransaction ）和对象存储，并打开一个游标 IDBObjectStore.openCursor ，宣布 keyRangeValue 作为可选键范围值。这意味着光标将只检索键值为“ A”的记录。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you'd use an upper bound key range. Here we declare keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.upperBound("F"); — a range that includes the value "F" and everything before it. We open a transaction (using IDBTransaction) and an object store, and open a Cursor with IDBObjectStore.openCursor, declaring keyRangeValue as its optional key range value.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了如何使用上限键范围。在这里，我们声明 keyRangeValue = IDBKeyRange.upperBound("F"); —包含值“ F”及其之前所有内容的范围。我们打开一个交易（使用 IDBTransaction ）和对象存储，并打开一个游标 IDBObjectStore.openCursor ，宣布 keyRangeValue 作为可选键范围值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates several features of this interface. It shows the creation of the WritableStream with a custom sink and an API-supplied queueing strategy. It then calls a function called sendMessage(), passing the newly created stream and a string. Inside this function it calls the stream's getWriter() method, which returns an instance of WritableStreamDefaultWriter. A forEach() call is used to write each chunk of the string to the stream. Finally, write() and close() return promises that are processed to deal with success or failure of chunks and streams.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了此界面的一些功能。它显示了使用自定义接收器和API提供的排队策略创建 WritableStream 的过程。然后，它调用一个名为 sendMessage() 的函数，传递新创建的流和一个字符串。在此函数内部，它调用流的 getWriter() 方法，该方法返回 WritableStreamDefaultWriter 的实例。甲 forEach() 调用用于写入字符串到流的每个组块。最后， write() 和 close() 返回承诺，该承诺将被处理以处理块和流的成功或失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates several features of this interface. It shows the creation of the WritableStream with a custom sink and an API-supplied queueing strategy. It then calls a function called sendMessage(), passing the newly created stream and a string. Inside this function it calls the stream's getWriter() method, which returns an instance of WritableStreamDefaultWriter. A forEach() call is used to write each chunk of the string to the stream. Finally, write() and close() return promises that are processed to deal with success or failure of chunks and streams.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了此界面的一些功能。它显示了使用自定义接收器和API提供的排队策略创建 WritableStream 的过程。然后，它调用一个名为 sendMessage() 的函数，传递新创建的流和一个字符串。在此函数内部，它调用流的 getWriter() 方法，该方法返回 WritableStreamDefaultWriter 的实例。甲 forEach() 调用用于写入字符串到流的每个组块。最后， write() 和 close() 返回承诺，该承诺将被处理以处理块和流的成功或失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates using the resource timing properties to calculate the amount of time the following phases take: redirection (redirectStart and redirectEnd ), DNS lookup (domainLookupStart and domainLookupEnd), TCP handshake (connectStart and connectEnd), and response (responseStart and responseEnd). This example also calculates the time from the start of the fetch and request start phases (fetchStart and requestStart, respectively), until the response has ended (responseEnd). This timing data provides a detailed profile of the resource loading phases and this data can be used to help identify performance bottlenecks.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了如何使用资源计时属性来计算以下阶段所需的时间：重定向（ redirectStart 和 redirectEnd ），DNS查找（ domainLookupStart 和 domainLookupEnd ），TCP握手（ connectStart 和 connectEnd ）以及响应（ responseStart 和 responseEnd ） 。此示例还计算从获取和请求开始阶段的开始（分别为 fetchStart 和 requestStart ）到响应结束的时间（ responseEnd ）。此计时数据提供了资源加载阶段的详细配置文件，并且该数据可用于帮助识别性能瓶颈。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows basic usage of a ScriptProcessorNode to take a track loaded via AudioContext.decodeAudioData(), process it, adding a bit of white noise to each audio sample of the input track (buffer) and play it through the AudioDestinationNode. For each channel and each sample frame, the scriptNode.onaudioprocess function takes the associated audioProcessingEvent and uses it to loop through each channel of the input buffer, and each sample in each channel, and add a small amount of white noise, before setting that result to be the output sample in each case.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 ScriptProcessorNode 的基本用法，以获取通过 AudioContext.decodeAudioData() 加载的音轨，对其进行处理，向输入音轨（缓冲区）的每个音频样本中添加一点白噪声，然后通过 AudioDestinationNode 进行播放。对于每个通道和每个样本帧， scriptNode.onaudioprocess 函数采用关联的 audioProcessingEvent 并使用它循环遍历输入缓冲区的每个通道以及每个通道中的每个样本，并在设置结果之前添加少量白噪声分别作为输出样本。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows basic usage of a ScriptProcessorNode to take a track loaded via AudioContext.decodeAudioData(), process it, adding a bit of white noise to each audio sample of the input track (buffer) and play it through the AudioDestinationNode. For each channel and each sample frame, the scriptNode.onaudioprocess function takes the associated audioProcessingEvent and uses it to loop through each channel of the input buffer, and each sample in each channel, and add a small amount of white noise, before setting that result to be the output sample in each case.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 ScriptProcessorNode 的基本用法，以获取通过 AudioContext.decodeAudioData() 加载的音轨，对其进行处理，向输入音轨（缓冲区）的每个音频样本中添加一点白噪声，然后通过 AudioDestinationNode 进行播放。对于每个通道和每个样本帧， scriptNode.onaudioprocess 函数采用关联的 audioProcessingEvent 并使用它循环遍历输入缓冲区的每个通道以及每个通道中的每个样本，并在设置结果之前添加少量白噪声分别作为输出样本。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows basic usage of an AudioContext to create a convolver node. The basic premise is that you create an AudioBuffer containing a sound sample to be used as an ambience to shape the convolution (called the impulse response,) and apply that to the convolver. The example below uses a short sample of a concert hall crowd, so the reverb effect applied is really deep and echoey.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例显示了AudioContext创建卷积器节点的基本用法。基本前提是，您将创建一个AudioBuffer，其中包含一个声音样本，该声音样本将用作形成卷积（称为冲激响应）的环境，并将其应用于卷积器。下面的示例使用音乐厅人群的简短样本，因此所应用的混响效果确实很深并且很回音。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the basic use of the request() method with an asynchronous function as the callback. Once the callback is invoked, no other running code on this orign can hold `'my_resource'` until the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例显示了将 request() 方法与异步函数作为回调的基本用法。一旦回调被调用，该组织上的其他运行代码都无法容纳“ my_resource”，直到回调返回。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the creation of a WritableStream with a custom sink and an API-supplied queueing strategy. It then calls a function called sendMessage(), passing the newly created stream and a string. Inside this function it calls the stream's getWriter() method, which returns an instance of WritableStreamDefaultWriter. A forEach() call is used to write each chunk of the string to the stream. Finally, write() and close() return promises that are processed to deal with success or failure of chunks and streams.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了使用自定义接收器和API提供的排队策略创建 WritableStream 的过程。然后，它调用一个名为 sendMessage() 的函数，传递新创建的流和一个字符串。在此函数内部，它调用流的 getWriter() 方法，该方法返回 WritableStreamDefaultWriter 的实例。甲 forEach() 调用用于写入字符串到流的每个组块。最后， write() 和 close() 返回承诺，该承诺将被处理以处理块和流的成功或失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the creation of a WritableStream with a custom sink and an API-supplied queueing strategy. It then calls a function called sendMessage(), passing the newly created stream and a string. Inside this function it calls the stream's getWriter() method, which returns an instance of WritableStreamDefaultWriter. A forEach() call is used to write each chunk of the string to the stream. Finally, write() and close() return promises that are processed to deal with success or failure of chunks and streams.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了使用自定义接收器和API提供的排队策略创建 WritableStream 的过程。然后，它调用一个名为 sendMessage() 的函数，传递新创建的流和一个字符串。在此函数内部，它调用流的 getWriter() 方法，该方法返回 WritableStreamDefaultWriter 的实例。甲 forEach() 调用用于写入字符串到流的每个组块。最后， write() 和 close() 返回承诺，该承诺将被处理以处理块和流的成功或失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two uses of the ready property. The first uses ready to ensure that the WritableStream is done writing and thus able to receive data before sending a binary chunk. The second also checks whether the the WritableStream is done writing, but this time because the writing must be finished before the writer can be closed.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例显示了 ready 属性的两种用法。第一个使用 ready 来确保 WritableStream 完成写入，因此能够在发送二进制块之前接收数据。第二个方法还检查 WritableStream 是否已完成写入，但这一次是因为必须在关闭写入器之前完成写入。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an oscillator and moves it in front of the listener after 1 second, behind the listener after 2 seconds, and back to the listener's position after 3 seconds. Note that in this case, the change will mainly affect the timbre and perceived volume of the sound.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子启动了一个振荡器,并在1秒后将其移到听众前面,2秒后移到听众后面,3秒后移回听众的位置。请注意,在这种情况下,这种变化将主要影响声音的音色和感知的音量。

trans-unit.source: The following example starts an oscillator and pans it above the listener after 1 second, below the listener after 2 seconds, and back to the center after 3 seconds. Note that in this case, the change will mainly affect the timbre of the oscillator, as it's a simple mono wave.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子启动了一个振荡器,并在1秒后将其平移到听者上方,2秒后平移到听者下方,3秒后平移回中心。请注意,在这种情况下,变化将主要影响振荡器的音色,因为它是一个简单的单声道波。

trans-unit.source: The following interfaces are included in the spec for purposes such as defining features used in multiple other places, or to serve as bases for multiple interfaces which can all be used as values of the same properties. You wouldn't directly use these in web development work, but they may be interesting for library authors to understand how the technology works so their implementations can be more effective, or for browser engineers looking for an easier reference than the spec provides.

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to specify a basic and advanced set of constraints. It specifies that the page or web app needs a width between 640 and 1280 and a height between 480 and 720, with the later number in each pair being preferred. The advanced property further specifies that an image size of 1920 by 1280 is the preferred or an aspect ratio of 1.333 if that is not available. Note that these constraints also illustrate what the spec refers to as a backoff strategy.
trans-unit.target: 下面显示了如何指定基本和高级约束集。它指定页面或Web应用程序需要在640和1280之间的宽度以及在480和720之间的高度，每对中的后一个数字是首选。 advanced属性进一步指定1920 x 1280的图像大小是首选，如果没有可用的宽高比，则为1.333。请注意，这些限制还说明了规范称为退避策略的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following simple code snippet, registers a single handler for the touchstart, touchmove and touchend events. When the src element is touched, the element's width and height will be calculate based on the touch point's radiusX and radiusY values and the element will then be rotated using the touch point's rotationAngle.
trans-unit.target: 以下简单代码段为 touchstart ， touchmove 和 touchend 事件注册了一个处理程序。当 src 元件被触摸时，元件的宽度和高度将被计算基于触摸点的 radiusX 和 radiusY 值和元件将随后使用触摸点的旋转 rotationAngle 。

trans-unit.source: The following simple example shows a function that can be used to set a custom field of view with four specified degree values for up, right, down and left. trans-unit.source: The following simple example shows a function that can be used to set a custom field of view with four specified degree values for up, right, down and left. trans-unit.target: 下面的简单示例显示了一个函数，该函数可用于使用四个指定的度值分别针对上，右，下和左设置自定义视场。所述 VRFieldOfView() 的构造是用来创建一个 VRFieldOfView 从所提供的值，然后将其馈送到对象 HMDVRDevice.setFieldOfView 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following simple example shows how you could separate a stereo track (say, a piece of music), and process the left and right channel differently. To use them, you need to use the second and third parameters of the AudioNode.connect(AudioNode) method, which allow you to specify the index of the channel to connect from and the index of the channel to connect to.

trans-unit.source: The following text is shared between this article, DOM:window.confirm and DOM:window.alert Dialog boxes are modal windows; they prevent the user from accessing the rest of the program's interface until the dialog box is closed. For this reason, you should not overuse any function that creates a dialog box (or modal window).

trans-unit.source: The following text is shared between this article, DOM:window.prompt and DOM:window.alert Dialog boxes are modal windows - they prevent the user from accessing the rest of the program's interface until the dialog box is closed. trans-unit.source: The function that is repeatedly invoked (read/write). It is called with three arguments: index (the iterative index of each invocation), length (the number of total invocations assigned to the daemon - finite or Infinity) and backwards (a boolean expressing whether the index is decreasing or not) – see above. If the myDaemon.task function returns a false value the daemon is paused.
trans-unit.target: 重复调用的功能（读/写）。它使用三个参数来调用：索引（每次调用的迭代索引），长度（分配给守护程序的总调用次数-有限或 Infinity ）和向后（表示索引是否在减小的布尔值）–参见上文。如果 myDaemon.task 函数返回 false 值，则守护程序将暂停。

trans-unit.source: The function that is repeatedly invoked . It is called with three parameters: index (the iterative index of each invocation), length (the number of total invocations assigned to the daemon - finite or Infinity) and backwards (a boolean expressing whether the index is increasing or decreasing). It is something like callback.call(thisObject, index, length, backwards). If the callback function returns a false value the daemon is paused.
trans-unit.target: 反复调用的功能。它使用三个参数来调用：索引（每个调用的迭代索引），长度（分配给守护程序的总调用数-有限或 Infinity ）和向后（表示索引是递增还是递减的布尔值）。它类似于callback .call（thisObject，index，length，向后）。如果回调函数返回一个 false 值，则守护程序将暂停。

trans-unit.source: The function that we will be using is part of the utility functions. It takes an array of matrices and multiplies them together. trans-unit.target: 我们将使用的功能是实用程序功能的一部分。它需要一组矩阵并将它们相乘。在WebGL着色器代码中，这是语言内置的功能，可以使用*运算符。另外，该示例使用缩放和平移函数，该函数返回如上定义的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The function we'll be using as our task handler—that is, the function that will be used as the value of the task object's handler property—is logTaskHandler(). It's a simple function that outputs a bunch of stuff to the log for each task. In your own application, you'd replace this code with whatever task it is you wish to perform during idle time. Just remember that anything you want to do that changes the DOM needs to be handled through requestAnimationFrame().

trans-unit.source: The gain is a unitless value, changing with time, that is multiplied to each corresponding sample of all input channels. If modified, the new gain is instantly applied, causing unaesthetic 'clicks' in the resulting audio. To prevent this from happening, never change the value directly but use the exponential interpolation methods on the AudioParam interface.
trans-unit.target: 增益是随时间变化的无单位值，该值乘以所有输入通道的每个对应样本。如果进行了修改，则会立即应用新的增益，从而在生成的音频中引起不美观的“喀哒”声。为防止这种情况发生，请不要直接更改该值，而应在 AudioParam 接口上使用指数插值方法。

trans-unit.source: The handshake is the "Web" in WebSockets. It's the bridge from HTTP to WS. The server must be careful to understand everything the client asks for, otherwise security issues will be introduced.

trans-unit.source: The index is a persistent key-value storage where the value part of its records is the key part of a record in the referenced object store. The records in an index are automatically populated whenever records in the referenced object store are inserted, updated, or deleted. Each record in an index can point to only one record in its referenced object store, but several indexes can reference the same object store. When the object store changes, all indexes that refers to the object store are automatically updated.
trans-unit.target: 索引是一个持久的键值存储,其记录的值部分是被引用对象存储中记录的键部分。每当插入、更新或删除被引用对象存储中的记录时,索引中的记录就会自动填充。索引中的每条记录只能指向其引用的对象存储中的一条记录,但多个索引可以引用同一个对象存储。当对象存储发生变化时,所有引用对象存储的索引都会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The install event is fired when an install is successfully completed. The install event is generally used to populate your browser’s offline caching capabilities with the assets you need to run your app offline. To do this, we use Service Worker’s brand new storage API — cache — a global object on the service worker that allows us to store assets delivered by responses, and keyed by their requests. This API works in a similar way to the browser’s standard cache, but it is specific to your domain. It persists until you tell it not to — again, you have full control.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成安装后，将触发安装事件。install事件通常用于使用脱机运行应用程序所需的资产来填充浏览器的脱机缓存功能。为此，我们使用Service Worker的全新存储API（ cache -Service Worker上的全局对象，该全局对象使我们可以存储由响应传递的资产，并由他们的请求作为键。该API的工作方式与浏览器的标准缓存类似，但是它特定于您的域。它会一直持续到您告诉它不要-再次，您可以完全控制。

trans-unit.source: The introduction of new input mechanisms results in increased application complexity to handle various input events, such as key events, mouse events, pen/stylus events, and touch events. To help address this problem, the Pointer Events standarddefines events and related interfaces for handling hardware agnostic pointer input from devices including a mouse, pen, touchscreen, etc.. That is, the abstract pointer creates a unified input model that can represent a contact point for a finger, pen/stylus or mouse.
trans-unit.target: 新输入机制的引入导致处理各种输入事件（例如按键事件，鼠标事件，笔/手写笔事件和触摸事件）的应用程序复杂性增加。为了帮助解决此问题，“ 指针事件”标准定义了事件和相关接口，用于处理来自设备（包括鼠标，笔，触摸屏等）的与硬件无关的指针输入。也就是说，抽象指针将创建一个统一的输入模型，该模型可以表示手指，笔/手写笔或鼠标的接触点。

trans-unit.source: The last color stop in each of the four gradients uses a fully transparent color. If you want to have a nice transition from this to the previous color stop, both colors should be equal. This isn't very obvious from the code because it uses two different CSS color methods as a demonstration, but in the first gradient #019F62 = rgba(1,159,98,1).

trans-unit.source: The last line contained in this function is a WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.setTimeout() call, which runs the reportGamepads() function after a 1 second delay. Why do we need to do this? First of all, VR controllers will only be ready after their associated VR headset is active, so we need to invoke this after getVRDisplays() has been called and returned the display information. Second, the Gamepad API is much older than the WebVR API, and not promise-based. As you'll see later, the getGamepads() method is synchronous, and just returns the Gamepad objects immediately — it doesn't wait for the controller to be ready to report information. Unless you wait for a little while, returned information may not be accurate (at least, this is what we found in our tests).
trans-unit.target: 此函数中包含的最后一行是 WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.setTimeout() 调用，该调用在延迟1秒后运行 reportGamepads() 函数。为什么我们需要这样做？首先，VR控制器只有在其关联的VR头戴式耳机处于活动状态后才能准备就绪，因此我们需要在调用 getVRDisplays() 并返回显示信息之后调用此功能。其次，Gamepad API比WebVR API老得多，并且不是基于承诺的。稍后您将看到， getGamepads() 方法是同步的，只返回 Gamepad 立即对象-它不会等待控制器准备好报告信息。除非您稍等片刻，否则返回的信息可能并不准确（至少，这是我们在测试中发现的信息）。

trans-unit.source: The last part of the code simply updates the pitch/rate values displayed in the UI, each time the slider positions are moved.
trans-unit.target: 每次移动滑块位置时，代码的最后一部分仅更新UI中显示的 pitch / rate 值。

trans-unit.source: The last part of the rendering loop involves us calling VRDisplay.submitFrame() — now all the work has been done and we've rendered the display on the <canvas>, this method then submits the frame to the VR display so it is displayed on there as well.
trans-unit.target: 渲染循环的最后一部分涉及到我们调用 VRDisplay.submitFrame() 的工作-现在所有工作都已经完成，并且已经在 <canvas> 上渲染了显示内容，然后此方法将帧提交到VR显示内容以便显示在那里。

trans-unit.source: The last significant piece of the puzzle: code that displays, for the user's reference, a list of the constrainable properties which their browser supports. Each property is a link to its documentation on MDN for the user's convenience. See the Example in MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints() for details on how this code works.
trans-unit.target: 难题的最后一个重要方面：代码显示了供浏览器支持的可约束属性列表，以供用户参考。为了方便用户，每个属性都是指向其MDN文档的链接。见实例中MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints（）对这个代码是如何工作的细节。

trans-unit.source: The last step of filling in the w component can actually be accomplished with a simple matrix. Start with the identity matrix:
trans-unit.target: 最后一步填入w分量,其实可以用一个简单的矩阵来完成。从身份矩阵开始。

trans-unit.source: The last thing the callback does is call setTimeout() to schedule itself to be called again as soon as possible. In the real world, you would probably schedule this to be done based on knowledge of the video's frame rate.
trans-unit.target: 回调的最后一件事是调用 setTimeout() 来安排自己尽快被再次调用。在现实世界中，您可能会根据对视频帧频的了解来安排执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The last thing to do here is set the initialRun variable to false, as the initial run is now over.
trans-unit.target: 最后要做的是将 initialRun 变量设置为 false ，因为初始运行现在结束了。

trans-unit.source: The last thing we need to do in order to begin connecting our peers is to create a connection offer.
trans-unit.target: 为了开始连接同行,我们需要做的最后一件事是创建一个连接提议。

trans-unit.source: The last two handlers are there to handle cases where speech was recognised that wasn't in the defined grammar, or an error occured. SpeechRecognition.onnomatch seems to be supposed to handle the first case mentioned, although note that at the moment it doesn't seem to fire correctly in Firefox or Chrome; it just returns whatever was recognised anyway:
trans-unit.target: 最后两个处理程序在那里处理识别出的语音不在所定义的语法中或发生错误的情况。 SpeechRecognition.onnomatch 应该可以处理提到的第一种情况，不过请注意，目前看来，它在Firefox或Chrome中似乎无法正确启动；它只会返回无论如何都可以识别的内容：

trans-unit.source: The last way is to generate your own sound, which can be done with either an OscillatorNode or by creating a buffer and populating it with your own data. Check out the tutorial here for creating your own instrument for information on creating sounds with oscillators and buffers.
trans-unit.target: 最后一种方法是生成自己的声音，可以使用 OscillatorNode 或通过创建缓冲区并用自己的数据填充来完成。在此处查看有关创建自己的乐器的教程，以获取有关使用振荡器和缓冲器创建声音的信息。

trans-unit.source: The latest spec has updated this method to a promise-based syntax that works like this:
trans-unit.target: 最新的规范已经将这种方法更新为基于承诺的语法,工作原理是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The left (L and SL), right (R and SR) and central channels are all mixed together. The surround channels are slightly attenuated and the regular lateral channels are power-compensated to make them count as a single channel by multiplying by √2/2. The subwoofer (LFE) channel is lost.
trans-unit.target: 左声道（ L 和 SL ），右声道（ R 和 SR ）和中央声道混合在一起。环绕声道会稍微衰减，常规的横向声道会进行功率补偿，以乘以 √2/2 使其计为单个声道。低音炮（ LFE ）通道丢失。

trans-unit.source: The left offset of the bounds.
trans-unit.target: 边界的左偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The legacy onpropertychange event can be used to create a living classList mockup thanks to a Element.prototype.className property that fires the specified event once it is changed.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Element.prototype.className 属性可在指定事件更改后触发该事件，因此可以使用旧式 onpropertychange 事件创建活动的 classList 模型。

trans-unit.source: The legacy Performance.navigation read-only property returns a PerformanceNavigation object representing the type of navigation that occurs in the given browsing context, such as the number of redirections needed to fetch the resource.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 Performance .navigation 只读属性返回 PerformanceNavigation 对象，该对象表示在给定浏览上下文中发生的导航的类型，例如获取资源所需的重定向数。

trans-unit.source: The legacy Performance.timing read-only property returns a PerformanceTiming object containing latency-related performance information.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 Performance .timing 只读属性返回一个 PerformanceTiming 对象，其中包含与延迟相关的性能信息。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceNavigation.redirectCount read-only property returns an unsigned short representing the number of REDIRECTs done before reaching the page.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceNavigation .redirectCount 只读属性返回一个 unsigned short 表示到达页面之前完成的REDIRECT的数量。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceNavigation.type read-only property returns an unsigned short containing a constant describing how the navigation to this page was done. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceNavigation .type 只读属性返回一个 unsigned short 其中包含一个常量，该常量描述了如何导航到此页面。可能的值为：

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.connectEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, where the connection is opened network. If the transport layer reports an error and the connection establishment is started again, the last connection establisment end time is given. If a persistent connection is used, the value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart. A connection is considered as opened when all secure connection handshake, or SOCKS authentication, is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .connectEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来的那一刻（此时间段是连接网络打开的那一刻）之后的毫秒数。如果传输层报告错误，并且连接建立再次开始，则给出最后的连接建立结束时间。如果使用持久连接，则该值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。当所有安全连接握手或SOCKS身份验证终止时，连接被视为已打开。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.connectStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, where the request to open a connection is sent to the network. If the transport layer reports an error and the connection establishment is started again, the last connection establisment start time is given. If a persistent connection is used, the value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .connectStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来以毫秒为单位的那一刻开始打开网络的请求发送到网络的那一刻。如果传输层报告错误，并且连接建立再次开始，则给出最后的连接建立开始时间。如果使用持久连接，则该值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domComplete read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the parser finished its work on the main document, that is when its Document.readyState changes to 'complete' and the corresponding readystatechange event is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .domComplete 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX时代起以毫秒为单位的那一刻，该时刻是解析器完成对主文档的工作时，即其 Document.readyState 更改为 'complete' 并且相应的 readystatechange 事件被抛出。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domContentLoadedEventEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in milliseconds since the UNIX epoch, right after all the scripts that need to be executed as soon as possible, in order or not, has been executed.
trans-unit.target: 旧有的 PerformanceTiming .domContentLoadedEventEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来的时刻（以毫秒为单位），表示需要立即执行（无论是否按顺序）的所有脚本。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domContentLoadedEventStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, right before the parser sent the DOMContentLoaded event, that is right after all the scripts that need to be executed right after parsing has been executed.
trans-unit.target: 遗留的 PerformanceTiming .domContentLoadedEventStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来的毫秒数，即解析器发送 DOMContentLoaded 事件之前的那一刻，即紧接在解析后需要执行的所有脚本之后被执行。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domInteractive read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the parser finished its work on the main document, that is when its Document.readyState changes to 'interactive' and the corresponding readystatechange event is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .domInteractive 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX时代起以毫秒为单位的那一刻，即解析器完成对主文档的工作（即其 Document.readyState 更改为 'interactive' ，并且相应的 readystatechange 事件被抛出。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domLoading read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the parser started its work, that is when its Document.readyState changes to 'loading' and the corresponding readystatechange event is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 遗留的 PerformanceTiming .domLoading 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX时代开始的毫秒数，即解析器开始工作时的毫秒数，即解析器的 Document.readyState 更改为 'loading' 并且相应的 readystatechange 事件为抛出。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domainLookupEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, where the domain lookup is finished. If a persistent connection is used, or the information is stored in a cache or a local resource, the value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .domainLookupEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示该时刻，距离自UNIX时代（域查询完成）开始的毫秒数。如果使用持久连接，或者信息存储在缓存或本地资源中，则该值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.domainLookupStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, where the domain lookup starts. If a persistent connection is used, or the information is stored in a cache or a local resource, the value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .domainLookupStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示该时刻，以秒为单位，从UNIX纪元开始域查找以来的毫秒数。如果使用持久连接，或者信息存储在缓存或本地资源中，则该值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.fetchStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, the browser is ready to fetch the document using an HTTP request. This moment is before the check to any application cache.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .fetchStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来的毫秒数（即毫秒），浏览器已准备好使用HTTP请求来获取文档。此刻在检查任何应用程序缓存之前。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.loadEventEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the load event handler terminated, that is when the load event is completed. If this event has not yet been sent, or is not yet completed, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .loadEventEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元开始（即 load 事件处理程序终止时）（即，负载事件完成）的那一刻起的毫秒数。如果此事件尚未发送或尚未完成，则返回 0.

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.loadEventStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the load event was sent for the current document. If this event has not yet been sent, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .loadEventStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来以毫秒为单位的当前时间，该时间是为当前文档发送 load 事件的时间。如果尚未发送此事件，则返回 0.

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.navigationStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, right after the prompt for unload terminates on the previous document in the same browsing context. If there is no previous document, this value will be the same as PerformanceTiming.fetchStart.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .navigationStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 值，该值表示从UNIX时代起的毫秒数，即卸载提示在同一浏览上下文中的上一个文档终止之后的瞬间。如果没有以前的文档，则此值将与 PerformanceTiming.fetchStart 相同。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.redirectEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, the last HTTP redirect is completed, that is when the last byte of the HTTP response has been received. If there is no redirect, or if one of the redirect is not of the same origin, the value returned is 0.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .redirectEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元到最近的HTTP重定向完成（即已接收到HTTP响应的最后一个字节）的瞬间（以毫秒为单位）。如果没有重定向，或者其中一个重定向源不相同，则返回的值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.redirectStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, the first HTTP redirect starts. If there is no redirect, or if one of the redirect is not of the same origin, the value returned is 0.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .redirectStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX时代开始的毫秒（毫秒）之内的时间，该时间是第一个HTTP重定向开始的时间。如果没有重定向，或者其中一个重定向源不相同，则返回的值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.requestStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the browser sent the request to obtain the actual document, from the server or from a cache. If the transport layer fails after the start of the request and the connection is reopened, this property will be set to the time corresponding to the new request.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .requestStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX时代以来的毫秒数，即从浏览器发送请求到服务器或高速缓存中获取实际文档的那一刻（从UNIX时代开始）。如果在请求开始后传输层失败，并且连接重新打开，则此属性将设置为与新请求对应的时间。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.responseEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, when the browser received the last byte of the response, or when the connection is closed if this happened first, from the server from a cache or from a local resource.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .responseEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来的毫秒数，即从浏览器收到响应的最后一个字节时起的毫秒数，或者从服务器关闭连接（如果第一次发生则是关闭）的那一刻。从缓存或本地资源。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.responseStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment in time (in milliseconds since the UNIX epoch) when the browser received the first byte of the response from the server, cache, or local resource.
trans-unit.target: 传统的 PerformanceTiming .responseStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示浏览器从服务器，缓存或本地资源接收到响应的第一个字节时的时间（从UNIX纪元以来的毫秒数）。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.secureConnectionStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, where the secure connection handshake starts. If no such connection is requested, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .secureConnectionStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从安全连接握手开始的UNIX纪元以来的毫秒数（以毫秒为单位）。如果不请求此类连接，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.unloadEventEnd read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, the unload event handler finishes. If there is no previous document, or if the previous document, or one of the needed redirects, is not of the same origin, the value returned is 0.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .unloadEventEnd 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX纪元以来 unload 事件处理程序完成的瞬间（以毫秒为单位）。如果没有先前的文档，或者先前的文档或所需的重定向之一不是同一来源，则返回的值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceTiming.unloadEventStart read-only property returns an unsigned long long representing the moment, in miliseconds since the UNIX epoch, the unload event has been thrown. If there is no previous document, or if the previous document, or one of the needed redirects, is not of the same origin, the value returned is 0.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceTiming .unloadEventStart 只读属性返回一个 unsigned long long 表示从UNIX时代开始经过毫秒（毫秒）以来已抛出 unload 事件的那一刻。如果没有先前的文档，或者先前的文档或所需的重定向之一不是同一来源，则返回的值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The legacy PerformanceNavigation interface represents information about how the navigation to the current document was done.
trans-unit.target: 旧版 PerformanceNavigation 界面表示有关如何导航到当前文档的信息。

trans-unit.source: The legacy miscelleanous encodings: 'utf-16be', 'utf-16le', and 'x-user-defined'.
trans-unit.target: 旧式杂项编码： 'utf-16be' ， 'utf-16le' 和 'x-user-defined' 。

trans-unit.source: The legacy single-byte encodings: 'ibm866', 'iso-8859-2', 'iso-8859-3', 'iso-8859-4', 'iso-8859-5', 'iso-8859-6', 'iso-8859-7', 'iso-8859-8'', 'iso-8859-8i', 'iso-8859-10', 'iso-8859-13', 'iso-8859-14', 'iso-8859-15', 'iso-8859-16', 'koi8-r', 'koi8-u', 'macintosh', 'windows-874', 'windows-1250', 'windows-1251', 'windows-1252', 'windows-1253', 'windows-1254', 'windows-1255', 'windows-1256', 'windows-1257', 'windows-1258', or 'x-mac-cyrillic'.
trans-unit.target: 旧式单字节编码： 'ibm866' ， 'iso-8859-2' ， 'iso-8859-3' ， 'iso-8859-4' ， 'iso-8859-5' ， 'iso-8859-6' ， 'iso-8859-7' ， 'iso-8859-8'' ， 'iso-8859-8i' ， 'iso-8859-10' ， 'iso-8859-13' ， 'iso-8859-14' ， 'iso-8859-15' ， 'iso-8859-16' ， 'koi8-r' ， 'koi8-u' ， 'macintosh' ， 'windows-874' ， 'windows-1250' ， 'windows-1251' ， 'windows-1252' ， 'windows-1253' ， 'windows-1254' ， 'windows-1255' ， 'windows-1256' ， 'windows-1257' ， 'windows-1258' 或 'x-mac-cyrillic' 。

trans-unit.source: The length of time in milliseconds that the animation's effects will run. This is equal to the iteration duration multiplied by the iteration count.
trans-unit.target: 动画效果运行的时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。这等于迭代持续时间乘以迭代计数。

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in milliseconds, to wait between tones. The browser will enforce a minimum value of 30 ms (that is, if you specify a lower value, 30 ms will be used instead); the default is 70 ms.
trans-unit.target: 音色之间等待的时间长度,以毫秒为单位。浏览器将强制执行30毫秒的最小值(即,如果您指定一个较低的值,将使用30毫秒);默认值为70毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The letters A-D
trans-unit.target: 字母A-D

trans-unit.source: The level of the ambient light in lux.
trans-unit.target: 环境光的强度，以勒克斯为单位。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a service worker registration is beyond that of the ServiceWorkerRegistration objects that represent them within the lifetime of their corresponding service worker clients. The browser maintains a persistent list of active ServiceWorkerRegistration objects.
trans-unit.target: 服务工作者注册的生命周期超出了代表它们的 ServiceWorkerRegistration 对象的生命，该对象在其相应的服务工作者客户端的生命周期内。浏览器维护活动 ServiceWorkerRegistration 对象的持久列表。

trans-unit.source: The line let [kind, type, direction] = device.kind.match(/(\w+)(input|output)/i); deserves special notice. This uses destructuring assignment (a new feature of ECMAScript 6) to assign the values of the first three items in the array returned by String.match() to the variables kind, type, and direction. We do this because the value of MediaDeviceInfo.kind is a single string that includes both the media type and the direction the media flows, such as "audioinput" or "videooutput". This line, then, pulls out the type ("audio" or "video") and direction ("input" or "output") so they can be used to construct the string displayed in the list.
trans-unit.target: 该行 let [kind, type, direction] = device.kind.match(/(\w+)(input|output)/i); 值得特别注意。这使用分解分配（ECMAScript 6的新功能）将 String.match() 返回的数组中前三个项目的值分配给变量 kind ， type 和 direction 。我们这样做是因为 MediaDeviceInfo.kind 的值是包含媒体类型和媒体流向的单个字符串，例如“ audioinput”或“ videooutput”。然后，此行提取类型（“音频”或“视频”）和方向（“输入”或“输出”），以便可以使用它们构造列表中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The line begins at (30, 50) and ends at (150, 100).
The line height is the height of the first line of the cue as it appears on the video
trans-unit.target: 线高是指视频中出现的第一行提示的高度。

trans-unit.source: The line number in the document or worker at which the violation occurred.
trans-unit.target: 文件或工人中发生违规行为的行号。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the script file on which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的脚本文件的行号。

trans-unit.source: The line on the left uses the default "butt" option. It's drawn completely flush with the guides. The second is set to use the "round" option. This adds a semicircle to the end that has a radius half the width of the line. The line on the right uses the "square" option. This adds a box with an equal width and half the height of the line thickness.
trans-unit.target: 左侧的线使用默认的 "butt" 选项。绘制的线条与导向线完全齐平。第二个设置为使用 "round" 选项。这会在末端增加一个半圆，半径为线宽的一半。右边的线使用 "square" 选项。这将添加一个宽度等于线宽一半高度的框。

trans-unit.source: The line on the left uses the default butt option. You'll notice that it's drawn completely flush with the guides. The second is set to use the round option. This adds a semicircle to the end that has a radius half the width of the line. The line on the right uses the square option. This adds a box with an equal width and half the height of the line thickness.
trans-unit.target: 左侧的线使用默认的 butt 选项。您会注意到它的绘制与参考线完全齐平。第二个设置为使用 round 选项。这会在末端增加一个半圆，半径为线宽的一半。右边的线使用 square 选项。这将添加一个宽度等于线宽一半高度的框。

trans-unit.source: The line width is the thickness of the stroke centered on the given path. In other words, the area that's drawn extends to half the line width on either side of the path. Because canvas coordinates do not directly reference pixels, special care must be taken to obtain crisp horizontal and vertical lines.
trans-unit.target: 线宽是指以给定路径为中心的笔画厚度。换句话说,绘制的区域延伸到路径两边线宽的一半。由于画布坐标不直接引用像素,因此必须特别注意获得清晰的水平和垂直线条。

trans-unit.source: The main program shares with us the attribute aVertexPosition, which is the position of the vertex in whatever coordinate system it's using. We need to convert these values so that both components of the position are in the range -1.0 to 1.0. This can be done easily enough by multiplying by a scaling factor that's based on the context's aspect ratio. We'll see that computation shortly.
trans-unit.target: 主程序与我们共享属性 aVertexPosition ，这是顶点在其使用的任何坐标系中的位置。我们需要转换这些值，以便该位置的两个分量都在-1.0到1.0的范围内。通过乘以基于上下文的纵横比的缩放因子，可以很容易地做到这一点。我们将很快看到该计算。

trans-unit.source: The main thing you can't do in a Worker is directly affect the parent page. This includes manipulating the DOM and using that page's objects. You have to do it indirectly, by sending a message back to the main script via DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage, then actioning the changes from there.
trans-unit.target: 您无法在Worker中做的主要事情是直接影响父页面。这包括操作DOM和使用该页面的对象。您必须间接执行此操作，方法是通过 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage 将消息发送回主脚本，然后从那里执行更改。

trans-unit.source: The main thread of a Web browser is centered around its event loop. This code draws any pending updates to the Document currently being displayed, runs any JavaScript code the page needs to run, accepts events from input devices, and dispatches those events to the elements that should receive them. In addition, the event loop handles interactions with the operating system, updates to the browser's own user interface, and so forth. It's an extremely busy chunk of code, and your main JavaScript code may run right inside this thread along with all of this. Certainly most if not all code that is capable of making changes to the DOM is running in the main thread, since it's common for user interface changes to only be available to the main thread.
trans-unit.target: Web浏览器的主线程围绕其事件循环。此代码绘制当前正在显示的 Document 所有未决更新，运行该页面需要运行的所有JavaScript代码，接受来自输入设备的事件，并将这些事件分派给应该接收它们的元素。另外，事件循环处理与操作系统的交互，更新浏览器自己的用户界面，等等。这是一个非常繁忙的代码块，您的主要JavaScript代码可能会与所有这些代码一起直接在此线程内运行。当然，大多数（即使不是全部）能够更改DOM的代码都在主线程中运行，因为用户界面更改通常只对主线程可用。

trans-unit.source: The matrix that represents this transformation. In case the matrix object is changed directly (i.e., without using the methods on the SVGTransform interface itself) then the type of the SVGTransform changes to SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX.
trans-unit.target: 表示此转换的矩阵。矩阵对象处于活动状态，这意味着对 SVGTransform 对象所做的任何更改都会立即反映在矩阵对象中，反之亦然。在情况下，矩阵对象被直接改变（即，不使用在该方法 SVGTransform 接口本身）随后的类型 SVGTransform 变为 SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX 。

trans-unit.source: The mobile web contains two viewports, the layout viewport and the visual viewport. The layout viewport covers all the elements on a page and the visual viewport is what is actually visible on the screen. When the user pinch-zooms into the page, the visual viewport shrinks but the layout viewport is unchanged. User-interface features like the on-screen keyboard (OSK) can shrink the visual viewport without affecting the layout viewport.
trans-unit.target: 移动网络包含两个视口,布局视口和视觉视口。布局视口涵盖了页面上的所有元素,而视觉视口则是屏幕上实际可见的内容。当用户在页面中进行捏合缩放时,视觉视口会缩小,但布局视口不变。像屏幕键盘(OSK)这样的用户界面功能可以在不影响布局视口的情况下缩小视觉视口。

trans-unit.target: 在事务范围内用于隔离对对象存储中数据的访问的模式。有关可能的值，请参见下面的“常量”部分。默认值为 readonly 。

trans-unit.source: The more nodes in a graph, the higher the latency will be. For example, if your graph has a latency of 500ms, when the source node plays a sound, it will take half a second until that sound can be heard on your speakers (or even longer because of latency in the underlying audio device). Therefore, if you need to have interactive audio, keep the graph as small as possible, and put user-controlled audio nodes at the end of a graph. For example, a volume control (GainNode) should be the last node so that volume changes take immediate effect.
trans-unit.target: 图中的节点越多，延迟将越高。例如，如果您的图形的延迟时间为500毫秒，则当源节点播放声音时，将需要半秒钟才能在扬声器上听到该声音（由于底层音频设备的延迟，甚至会更长）。因此，如果您需要交互式音频，请使图表尽可能小，并将用户控制的音频节点放在图表的末尾。例如，音量控件（ GainNode ）应该是最后一个节点，以便音量更改立即生效。

trans-unit.target: 条件的最合适的错误代码。有关可能的值，请参见错误代码。

trans-unit.source: The most frequently-used feature of the console is logging of text and other data. There are four categories of output you can generate, using the console.log(), console.info(), console.warn(), and console.error() methods respectively. Each of these results in output styled differently in the log, and you can use the filtering controls provided by your browser to only view the kinds of output that interest you.
trans-unit.target: 控制台最常用的功能是记录文本和其他数据。您可以生成四种输出类别，分别使用 console.log() ， console.info() ， console.warn() 和 console.error() 方法。这些结果中的每一个都会导致输出在日志中的样式不同，并且您可以使用浏览器提供的过滤控件来仅查看您感兴趣的输出类型。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing to note here is that the grid-column is set to 1, to place the sidebar on the left-hand side of the screen. If you change this to -1, it will appear on the right (although some other elements will need some adjustments made to their margins to get the spacing just right). The grid-row is set to 2, to place it alongside the site body.
trans-unit.target: 这里要注意的最重要的一点是，将 grid-column 设置为1，以将侧栏放置在屏幕的左侧。如果将其更改为-1，它将显示在右侧（尽管某些其他元素将需要对其边距进行一些调整才能使间距恰到好处）。该 grid-row 设置为2，将其放在旁边的身体部位。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing to understand before we get started is that even though we're only rendering a square plane object in this example, we're still drawing in 3D space. It's just we're drawing a square and we're putting it directly in front of the camera perpendicular to the view direction. We need to define the shaders that will create the color for our simple scene as well as draw our object. These will establish how the square plane appears on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 在我们开始之前,最重要的一点是,尽管我们在这个例子中只渲染了一个正方形的平面对象,但我们仍然是在3D空间中绘图。只是我们绘制了一个正方形,并将其直接放在与视图方向垂直的摄像机前。我们需要定义着色器,这些着色器将为我们的简单场景创建颜色,以及绘制我们的对象。这些将建立正方形平面在屏幕上的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing to understand is that most constraints aren't requirements; instead, they're requests. There are exceptions, and we'll get to those shortly.
trans-unit.target: 最重要的一点是,大多数约束不是需求,而是请求。但也有例外,我们很快就会讲到。

trans-unit.source: The most obvious use of the connect() method is to direct the audio output from one node into the audio input of another node for further processing. For example, you might send the audio from a MediaElementAudioSourceNode—that is, the audio from an HTML5 media element such as <audio>—through a band pass filter implemented using a BiquadFilterNode to reduce noise before then sending the audio along to the speakers.
trans-unit.target: connect() 方法最明显的用途是将音频从一个节点输出到另一节点的音频输入中，以进行进一步处理。例如，您可以通过使用 BiquadFilterNode 实现的带通滤波器从 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 发送音频（即，来自 <audio> 之类的HTML5媒体元素的音频），以减少噪声，然后再将音频发送到扬声器。

trans-unit.source: The name of a lock is given by script when the lock is requested. The name is selected by the developer to represent some abstract resource for which use is being coordinated across multiple tabs, workers, or other code within the origin. trans-unit.source: The next bit of the code has nothing to do with WebVR — it just updates the rotation of the cube on each frame:
trans-unit.target: 代码的下一部分与WebVR无关-它仅更新每个帧上多维数据集的旋转：

trans-unit.source: The next change is to initTexture(), which becomes much simpler, since it no longer needs to load an image file. Instead, all it does is create an empty texture object, put a single pixel in it, and set its filtering for later use:
trans-unit.target: 下一个更改是 initTexture() ，它变得更加简单，因为它不再需要加载图像文件。相反，它所做的只是创建一个空的纹理对象，在其中放置一个像素，然后设置其过滤条件以备后用：

trans-unit.source: The next example creates a new RTCPeerConnection which will use a single TURN server which has multiple URLs. This is useful if the server is, for example, available both on "turn" and "turns" schemes, or if there's a fallback address available for the server.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例创建一个新的 RTCPeerConnection ，它将使用具有多个URL 的单个TURN服务器。例如，如果服务器在“转弯”和“转弯”方案上均可用，或者服务器具有备用地址，则此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The next example logs an object to the console, with the object's fields expandable using disclosure widgets:
trans-unit.target: 下一个例子将一个对象记录到控制台,对象的字段可以使用披露小部件进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: The next example removes the first child node inside the element with the id "foo" if foo has child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果foo有子节点，则下一个示例删除ID为 "foo" 的元素内的第一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: The next example scans through all of the media's audio tracks, enabling any that are in the user's preferred language (taken from a variable userLanguage) and disabling any others.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例扫描媒体的所有音频轨道，以用户喜欢的语言（从变量 userLanguage 中获取）中的任何一种启用，并禁用任何其他语言。

trans-unit.source: The next example scans through all of the media's video tracks, activating the first video track that is in the user's preferred language (taken from a variable userLanguage).
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例扫描所有媒体的视频轨道，激活用户首选语言（取自 userLanguage 变量）中的第一个视频轨道。

trans-unit.source: The next parameter is distanceModel — this can only be set to linear, inverse, or exponential. These are different algorithms, which are used to reduce the volume of the audio source as it moves away from the listener. We'll use linear, as it is simple:
trans-unit.target: 下一个参数是 distanceModel -只能设置为 linear ， inverse 或 exponential 。这些是不同的算法，用于减少音频源从听众移开时的音量。我们将使用 linear ，因为它很简单：

trans-unit.source: The next part of our code defines the grammar we want our app to recognise. The following variable is defined to hold our grammar:
trans-unit.target: 代码的下一部分定义了我们希望应用程序识别的语法。下面的变量被定义用来存放我们的语法。

trans-unit.source: The next rendering step involves:
trans-unit.target: 下一个渲染步骤涉及:

trans-unit.source: The next step is to connect the local peer to the remote by telling the remote peer about it. This is done by calling remoteConnection.RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription(). Now the remoteConnection knows about the connection that's being built.
trans-unit.target: 下一步是通过告诉本地对等方将其连接到远程。这是通过调用 remoteConnection. 完成的。 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() 。现在， remoteConnection 知道正在建立的连接。

trans-unit.source: The next step is to set up each connection with ICE candidate listeners; these will be called when there's a new ICE candidate to tell the other side about.
trans-unit.target: 下一步是为每个连接设置ICE候选监听器;当有新的ICE候选者要告诉对方时,这些监听器将被调用。

trans-unit.source: The next task is to get the media stream:
trans-unit.target: 接下来的任务是获取媒体流。

trans-unit.source: The next thing to do is define a speech recogntion instance to control the recognition for our application. This is done using the SpeechRecognition() constructor. We also create a new speech grammar list to contain our grammar, using the SpeechGrammarList() constructor.
trans-unit.target: 接下来要做的是定义语音识别实例，以控制对我们应用程序的识别。这是使用 SpeechRecognition() 构造函数完成的。我们还使用 SpeechGrammarList() 构造函数创建一个新的语音语法列表以包含我们的语法。

trans-unit.source: The next thing we do is to get the GamepadPose object for the controller stored in gpPose (by querying Gamepad.pose), and also store the current gamepad position and orientation for this frame in variables so they are easuy to access later. We also display the post stats for this frame in the DOM using the displayPoseStats() function. All of this is only done if gp actually has a value (if a gamepad is connected), which stops the demo erroring if we don't have our gamepad connected.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们要做的是获取存储在gpPose中的控制器的 GamepadPose 对象（通过查询 Gamepad.pose ），并将该框架当前的游戏手柄位置和方向存储在变量中，以便以后使用。我们还使用 displayPoseStats() 函数在DOM中显示此框架的后期统计。仅当 gp 实际上有一个值（如果连接了游戏手柄）时，所有这些操作才能完成；如果我们未连接游戏手柄，则这将停止演示错误。

trans-unit.source: The next transformation method is scaling. We use it to increase or decrease the units in our canvas grid. This can be used to draw scaled down or enlarged shapes and bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: 下一个变换方法是缩放。我们用它来增加或减少画布网格中的单位。这可以用来绘制缩小或放大的形状和位图。

trans-unit.source: The next type of paths available are Bézier curves, available in both cubic and quadratic varieties. These are generally used to draw complex organic shapes.
trans-unit.target: 可用的下一类路径是贝塞尔曲线，有三次和二次可用。这些通常用于绘制复杂的有机形状。

trans-unit.source: The normalized pressure of the pointer input in the range of 0 to 1, where 0 and 1 represent the minimum and maximum pressure the hardware is capable of detecting, respectively. For hardware that does not support pressure, including but not limited to mouse, the value MUST be 0.5 when the pointer is active and 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 指针输入的归一化压力,范围为0到1,其中0和1分别代表硬件能够检测到的最小压力和最大压力,对于不支持压力的硬件,包括但不限于鼠标,该值必须为0.5,否则为0。对于不支持压力的硬件,包括但不限于鼠标,当指针处于活动状态时,该值必须为0.5,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: The notification's data can be any arbitrary data that you want associated with the notification.

trans-unit.source: The notification's timestamp can represent the time, in milliseconds since 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970, of the event for which the notification was created, or it can be an arbitrary timestamp that you want associated with the notification. For example, a timestamp for an upcoming meeting could be set in the future, whereas a timestamp for a missed message could be set in the past.
trans-unit.target: 通知的时间戳可以代表自1970年1月1日00:00:00 UTC以来的时间(以毫秒为单位),也可以是您希望与通知关联的任意时间戳。例如,一个即将到来的会议的时间戳可以设置在未来,而一个错过的消息的时间戳可以设置在过去。
