trans-unit.target: TouchList 中 Touch 对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of logical processor cores is a way to measure the number of threads which can effectively be run at once without them having to share CPUs. Modern computers have multiple physical cores in their CPU (two or four cores is typical), but each physical core is also usually able to run more than one thread at a time using advanced scheduling techniques. So a four-core CPU may return 8. The browser may, however, choose to reduce the number in order to represent more accurately the number of Workers that can run at once
trans-unit.target: 逻辑处理器内核的数量是一种测量线程数量的方法，这些线程无需共享CPU即可立即有效运行。现代计算机的CPU中有多个物理核心（典型的是两个或四个核心），但每个物理核心通常也可以使用高级调度技术一次运行多个线程。因此，四核CPU可能返回8。但是，浏览器可以选择减少数量，以便更准确地表示可以一次运行的 Worker 的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of a device-specific configuration.
trans-unit.target: 特定设备配置的编号。

trans-unit.source: The number of a device-specific endpoint (buffer).
trans-unit.target: 特定设备端点(缓冲区)的编号。

trans-unit.source: The number of alternatives contained in the result depends on what the SpeechRecognition.maxAlternatives property was set to when the speech recognition was first initiated.
trans-unit.target: 结果中包含的替代项的数量取决于首次启动语音识别时将 SpeechRecognition.maxAlternatives 属性设置为什么。

trans-unit.source: The number of audio channels available on a signal is frequently presented in a numeric format, such as 2.0 or 5.1. This is called channel notation. The first number is the total number of audio channels that the signal includes. The number after the period indicates the number of those channels which are reserved for low-frequency effect (LFE) outputs; these are often referred to as subwoofers.
trans-unit.target: 信号上可用的音频通道数通常以数字格式表示，例如2.0或5.1。这称为通道符号。第一个数字是信号包含的音频通道的总数。句点后的数字表示为低频效果（LFE）输出保留的通道数。这些通常称为超低音扬声器。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits of precision that can be represented. For integer formats this value is always 0.
trans-unit.target: 可以表示的精度位数。对于整数格式,这个值总是0。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits used to hold the query result for the given target.
trans-unit.target: 用于保存给定目标的查询结果的位数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data currently queued to be sent over the data channel but have not yet been sent.
trans-unit.target: 当前排队等待通过数据通道发送但尚未发送的数据字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of queued data.
trans-unit.target: 排队数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels in the input audio stream that you want to output separately; the default is 6 if this parameter is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 输入音频流中要单独输出的通道数;如果没有指定此参数,默认为6。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels in the input audio streams, which the output stream will contain; the default is 6 if this parameter is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 输入音频流中的通道数,输出流将包含这些通道;如果没有指定该参数,默认为6。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels is defined by the value of channelCount.
trans-unit.target: 通道数由 channelCount 的值定义。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels is equal to the maximum number of channels of all connections, clamped to the value of channelCount.
trans-unit.target: 通道数等于所有连接的最大通道数，固定为 channelCount 的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels is equal to the maximum number of channels of all connections. In this case, channelCount is ignored and only up-mixing happens.
trans-unit.target: 通道数等于所有连接的最大通道数。在这种情况下， channelCount 将被忽略，仅发生上混。

trans-unit.source: The number of child nodes from the start of the anchor node that should be excluded from the selection. So for example, if the value is 0 the whole node is included. If the value is 1, the whole node minus the first child node is included. And so on.
trans-unit.target: 从锚节点开始的子节点数量,应该从选择中排除。因此,例如,如果值为0,则包括整个节点。如果值为1,则包括整个节点减去第一个子节点。以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The number of child nodes from the start of the focus node that should be included in the selection. So for example, if the value is 0 the whole node is excluded. If the value is 1, the first child node is included. And so on.
trans-unit.target: 从焦点节点开始的子节点数量,这些子节点应该被包含在选择中。例如,如果值为0,则整个节点被排除。如果值是1,则包含第一个子节点。以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees downwards that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向下延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees downwards that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向下延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees of rotation to apply to the described ellipse to align with the contact area between the user and the touch surface.
trans-unit.target: 应用于所述椭圆的旋转度数,使其与用户和触摸表面之间的接触区域对齐。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the left that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向左延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the left that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向左延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the right that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向右延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the right that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向右延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees upwards that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向上延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees upwards that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向上延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of drag data items in the list, or 0 if the list is empty or disabled. The drag item list is considered to be disabled if the item list's DataTransfer object is not associated with a drag data store.
trans-unit.target: 列表中拖动数据项的数量；如果列表为空或禁用，则为0。如果项目列表的 DataTransfer 对象未与拖动数据存储关联，则认为该拖动项目列表已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The number of filters does not specifiy the number of devices shown by the user agent. For example, if only a USB device with product ID 0xa800 is found, then only one device will be listed by the user agent. On the other hand if the user agent finds two of the first listed device and one of the second, then all three devices will be listed.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器的数量并不指定用户代理所显示的设备数量。例如,如果只找到一个产品ID为0xa800的USB设备,那么用户代理将只列出一个设备。另一方面,如果用户代理找到两个第一个列出的设备和一个第二个列出的设备,那么三个设备都会被列出。

trans-unit.source: The number of form controls within the <form>. This is the same as the number of the elements in the HTMLFormControlsCollection returned by the elements property.
trans-unit.target: <form> 中的表单控件数。这与 elements 属性返回的 HTMLFormControlsCollection 中的元素数相同。

trans-unit.source: The number of frames which have been
trans-unit.target: 帧数,已经

trans-unit.source: The number of input channels in the audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 音频流的输入通道数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the array.
trans-unit.target: 阵列中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds each iteration of the animation takes to complete. Defaults to 0. Although this is technically optional, keep in mind that your animation will not run if this value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 动画的每次迭代完成所需的毫秒数,默认值为0。默认值为0,虽然这在技术上是可选的,但请记住,如果这个值为0,你的动画将不会运行。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds long a single beginning-to-end iteration of the animation should take. The default is "auto". This value must not be negative; otherwise, it can have any value (including positive infinity).
trans-unit.target: 动画的从开始到结束的每次迭代应花费的毫秒数。默认值为 "auto" 。该值不能为负。否则，它可以具有任何值（包括正无穷大）。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds over which the browser may continue to attempt to transmit the message until it either succeeds or gives up. If not set when RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() was called to create the data channel, this value is null.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器可以继续尝试传输消息直到成功或放弃的毫秒数。如果在 RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() 创建数据通道时未设置，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to delay after the end of an animation. This is primarily of use when sequencing animations based on the end time of another animation. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 动画结束后要延迟的毫秒数。主要用于根据另一个动画的结束时间对动画进行排序时。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to delay the start of the animation. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 延迟动画开始的毫秒数。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to record into each Blob. If this parameter isn't included, the entire media duration is recorded into a single Blob unless the requestData() method is called to obtain the Blob and trigger the creation of a new Blob into which the media continues to be recorded.
trans-unit.target: 要记录到每个 Blob 中的毫秒数。如果不包括此参数，则除非 requestData() 方法获取 Blob 并触发创建新的 Blob 并将媒体继续记录到其中，否则整个媒体持续时间都会记录到一个 Blob 中。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes in the NodeList.
trans-unit.target: NodeList 中的节点数。

trans-unit.source: The number of output channels in the audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 音频流的输出通道数。

trans-unit.source: The number of plugins in the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的插件数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of properties. See the item() method below.
trans-unit.target: 属性数。请参见下面的 item() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The number of queued outgoing data bytes below which the buffer is considered to be "low."
trans-unit.target: 排队输出的数据字节数,低于此数的缓冲区被认为是 "低"。

trans-unit.source: The number of texture units is implementation dependent, you can get this number with the help of the MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS constant. It is, per specification, at least 8.
trans-unit.target: 纹理单元的数量取决于实现，您可以在 MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS 常量的帮助下获得该数量。根据规格，至少为8。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the animation should repeat. Defaults to 1, and can also take a value of Infinity to make it repeat for as long as the element exists.
trans-unit.target: 动画应重复的次数。默认值为 1 ，并且也可以采用 Infinity 的值，以使其重复一次，只要元素存在即可。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the receiver notified the sender that one or more RTP packets has been lost by sending a Negative ACKnowledgement (NACK, also called "Generic NACK") packet to the sender. This value is only available to the receiver.
trans-unit.target: 接收方通过向发送方发送一个消极的ACKnowledgegement(NACK,也叫 "通用NACK")数据包,通知发送方一个或多个RTP数据包丢失的次数。这个值只对接收方有效。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the receiver notified the sender that one or more consecutive (in scan order) encoded video macroblocks have been lost or corrupted; this notification is sent by the receiver to the sender using a Slice Loss Indication (SLI) packet. This is a fairly technical part of how codecs work and while the higher this value is, the more errors occurred in the stream, generally most of the time this value is only interesting to very intensively hardcore media developers.
trans-unit.target: 接收方通知发送方一个或多个连续(按扫描顺序)编码的视频宏块丢失或损坏的次数;该通知由接收方使用片断丢失指示(SLI)包发送给发送方。这是编解码器工作中相当技术性的部分,虽然这个值越高,流中发生的错误就越多,但一般来说,大多数时候这个值只对非常密集的硬核媒体开发人员感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the receiving end of the stream sent a Picture Loss Indiciation (PLI) packet to the sender, indicating that it has lost some amount of encoded video data for one or more frames. Only the receiver has this value, and it's only valid for video tracks.
trans-unit.target: 流的接收端向发送端发送Picture Loss Indiciation (PLI)数据包的次数,表示它已经丢失了一帧或多帧的某种数量的编码视频数据。只有接收端才有这个值,而且它只对视频轨道有效。

trans-unit.source: The number of times this animation has looped, starting from 0. Returns null if the animation is not running or its KeyframeEffect isn't associated with an Animation.
trans-unit.target: 此动画从 0 开始循环播放的次数。如果动画没有运行或其动画的 KeyframeEffect 没有与 Animation 关联，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The number of times to move the cursor forward.
trans-unit.target: 向前移动光标的次数。

trans-unit.source: The number of touch points in touchList.
trans-unit.target: touchList 中的接触点数。

trans-unit.source: The number of tracks in the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的曲目数量。

trans-unit.source: The number records to return. If this value exceeds the number of records in the query, the browser will only retrieve the first item. If it is lower than 0 or greater than 232-1 a TypeError exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的号码记录。如果此值超过查询中的记录数，则浏览器将仅检索第一项。如果它低于 0 或大于 232-1 一个 TypeError 会抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: The object URL is a string identifying the File object. Each time you call window.URL.createObjectURL(), a unique object URL is created even if you've created an object URL for that file already. Each of these must be released. While they are released automatically when the document is unloaded, if your page uses them dynamically you should release them explicitly by calling window.URL.revokeObjectURL():
trans-unit.target: 对象URL是标识 File 对象的字符串。每次调用 window.URL.createObjectURL() 时，即使已经为该文件创建了对象URL，也会创建一个唯一的对象URL。这些都必须释放。尽管它们在文档卸载时自动释放，但是如果页面动态使用它们，则应通过调用 window.URL.revokeObjectURL() 显式释放它们：

trans-unit.source: The object can not be cloned. (Legacy code value: 25 and legacy constant name: DATA_CLONE_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 无法克隆对象。（旧版代码值： 25 ，旧版常量名称： DATA_CLONE_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be found here. (Legacy code value: 8 and legacy constant name: NOT_FOUND_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 在此找不到对象。（旧版代码值： 8 ，旧版常量名称： NOT_FOUND_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be modified in this way. (Legacy code value: 13 and legacy constant name: INVALID_MODIFICATION_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 无法以这种方式修改对象。（旧版代码值： 13 ，旧版常量名称： INVALID_MODIFICATION_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be modified. (Legacy code value: 7 and legacy constant name: NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 无法修改对象。（旧版代码值： 7 和旧版常量名称： NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object does not support the operation or argument. (Legacy code value: 15 and legacy constant name: INVALID_ACCESS_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 该对象不支持该操作或参数。（旧版代码值： 15 ，旧版常量名称： INVALID_ACCESS_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object is an RTCIceCandidateStats object containing statistics about the remote candidate's RTCIceTransport. This may include information such as the type of network, the protocol, the URL, the type of relay being used, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 该对象是 RTCIceCandidateStats 对象，其中包含有关远程候选者的 RTCIceTransport 的统计信息。这可能包括诸如网络类型，协议，URL，所使用的中继类型等信息。

trans-unit.source: The object is in an invalid state. (Legacy code value: 11 and legacy constant name: INVALID_STATE_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 该对象处于无效状态。（旧版代码值： 11 和旧版常量名称： INVALID_STATE_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object is in the wrong Document. (Legacy code value: 4 and legacy constant name: WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 对象在错误的 Document 中。（旧版代码值： 4 ，旧版常量名称： WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object is one of the types based on RTCMediaHandlerStats: for audio tracks, the type is RTCSenderAudioTrackAttachmentStats and for video tracks, the type is RTCSenderVideoTrackAttachmentStats. The data within provides statistics related to a particular MediaStreamTrack's attachment to an RTCRtpSender; also included are the media level metrics that go along with the track.
trans-unit.target: 该对象是基于 RTCMediaHandlerStats 的类型之一：对于音频轨道，类型为 RTCSenderAudioTrackAttachmentStats ；对于视频轨道，类型为 RTCSenderVideoTrackAttachmentStats 。其中的数据提供与特定 MediaStreamTrack 附加到 RTCRtpSender 的统计信息；还包括轨道附带的媒体级别指标。

trans-unit.source: The object passed from the other window.
trans-unit.target: 从其他窗口传来的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object retrieved by getImageData() has a width of 200 and a height of 100, for a total of 20,000 pixels. Of those pixels, most are either transparent or taken from off the canvas; only 5,000 of them are opaque black (the color of the drawn rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 通过 getImageData() 检索的对象的宽度为200，高度为100，总共20,000个像素。在这些像素中，大多数是透明的或从画布上获取的。其中只有5,000个是不透明的黑色（绘制矩形的颜色）。

trans-unit.source: The object store auto increments.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储自动增量。

trans-unit.source: The object store does not auto increment.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储不会自动递增。

trans-unit.source: The object store has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储已被删除。

trans-unit.source: The object store uses in-line keys but no key generator, and the object store's key path does not yield a valid key.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储使用在线密钥,但没有密钥生成器,对象存储的密钥路径不能产生有效密钥。

trans-unit.source: The object store uses in-line keys or has a key generator, and a key parameter was provided.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储使用在线密钥或有密钥生成器,并提供了一个密钥参数。

trans-unit.source: The object store uses out-of-line keys and has no key generator, and no key parameter was provided.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储使用行外密钥,没有密钥生成器,也没有提供密钥参数。

trans-unit.source: The object store's transaction mode is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储的事务模式是只读。

trans-unit.source: The object to deliver to the main thread; this will be in the data field in the event delivered to the Worker.onmessage handler. This may be any value or JavaScript object handled by the structured clone algorithm, which includes cyclical references.
trans-unit.target: 传递给主线程的对象；这将在传递给 Worker.onmessage 处理程序的事件的数据字段中。这可以是结构化克隆算法处理的任何值或JavaScript对象，包括循环引用。

trans-unit.source: The object to deliver to the worker; this will be in the data field in the event delivered to the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage handler. This may be any value or JavaScript object handled by the structured clone algorithm, which includes cyclical references.
trans-unit.target: 交付给工人的对象；这将在传递给 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage 处理程序的事件的数据字段中。这可以是结构化克隆算法处理的任何值或JavaScript对象，包括循环引用。

trans-unit.source: The object which receives a notification (an object that implements the Event interface) when an event of the specified type occurs. This must be an object implementing the EventListener interface, or a JavaScript function. See The event listener callback for details on the callback itself.
trans-unit.target: 当指定类型的事件发生时，接收通知的对象（实现 Event 接口的对象）。这必须是实现 EventListener 接口的对象，或者是JavaScript 函数。有关回调本身的详细信息，请参见事件侦听器回调。

trans-unit.source: The observer, adObserver, is created by calling IntersectionObserver's constructor, passing in the callback function, intersectionCallback, and our options.
trans-unit.target: 观察者 adObserver 是通过调用 IntersectionObserver 的构造函数并传入回调函数， intersectionCallback 和我们的选项来创建的。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete Document interface's fullscreen read-only property reports whether or not the document is currently displaying content in full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 Document 界面的 fullscreen 只读属性报告当前文档是否以全屏模式显示内容。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete XMLHttpRequest method sendAsBinary() is a variant of the send() method that sends binary data. The send() method now supports binary data and should now be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 XMLHttpRequest 方法 sendAsBinary() 是发送二进制数据的 send() 方法的变体。所述 send() 方法现在支持二进制数据，并且现在应被代替使用。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTMLFontElement.size property is a DOMString that reflects the size HTML attribute. It contains either an integer number in the range of 1-7 or a relative value to increase/decrease the value of the size attribute of the <basefont> element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 HTMLFontElement.size 属性是一个 DOMString ，它反映了HTML属性的 size 。它包含一个1-7范围内的整数或一个用于增加/减小 <basefont> 元素的 size 属性值的相对值。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTMLFontElement.color property is a DOMString that reflects the color HTML attribute, containing either a named color or a color specified in the hexadecimal #RRGGBB format.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 HTMLFontElement .color 属性是 DOMString ，它反映了HTML color 属性，其中包含命名的颜色或以十六进制#RRGGBB格式指定的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTMLFontElement.face property is a DOMString that reflects the face HTML attribute, containing a comma-separated list of one or more font names.
trans-unit.target: HTMLFontElement .face 属性是一个过时的 DOMString ，它反映了 face HTML属性，其中包含一个或多个字体名称的逗号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete supportedTypes property of the BasicCardRequest dictionary can optionally be provided to specify an array of DOMStrings representing the card types that the retailer supports (e.g. credit, debit, prepaid).
trans-unit.target: 可以选择提供 BasicCardRequest 字典的过时的 supportedTypes 属性，以指定表示零售商支持的卡类型的 DOMString 数组（例如， credit ， debit ， prepaid ）。

trans-unit.source: The of the organization that manufactured the USB device.
trans-unit.target: 制造USB设备的组织的。

trans-unit.source: The offer sent by the remote peer has been applied and an answer has been created (usually by calling RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer()) and applied by calling RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(). This provisional answer describes the supported media formats and so forth, but may not have a complete set of ICE candidates included. Further candidates will be delivered separately later.
trans-unit.target: 已应用了远程对等方发送的要约，并创建了一个答案（通常通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer() ），并通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 来应用。此临时答案描述了受支持的媒体格式等，但可能未包含完整的ICE候选集。其他候选人将在以后另行交付。

trans-unit.source: The offer sent by the remote peer has been applied and an answer has been created (usually by calling RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer()) and applied by calling RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(). This provisional answer describes the supported media formats and so forth, but may not have a complete set of ICE candidates included. Further candidates will be delivered separately later.
trans-unit.target: 已应用了远程对等方发送的要约，并创建了一个答案（通常通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer() ），并通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 来应用。此临时答案描述了受支持的媒体格式等，但可能未包含完整的ICE候选集。其他候选人将在以后另行交付。

trans-unit.source: The offer/answer process is performed both when a call is first established, but also any time the call's format or other configuration needs to change. Regardless of whether it's a new call, or reconfiguring an existing one, these are the basic steps which must occur to exchange the offer and answer, leaving out the ICE layer for the moment:
trans-unit.target: 无论是在呼叫刚建立时,还是在呼叫的格式或其他配置需要改变时,都要进行交换提议/应答的过程。不管是新的呼叫,还是重新配置现有的呼叫,这些都是交换要约和应答必须发生的基本步骤,暂时不考虑ICE层。

trans-unit.source: The official usg.org-assigned vendor ID.
trans-unit.target: usg.org指定的官方供应商ID。

trans-unit.source: The offset in node to which the selection will be collapsed. If not specified, the default value 0 is used.
trans-unit.target: 选择将折叠到的 node 偏移量。如果未指定，则使用默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: The offset into Node of the point to compare with the Range.
trans-unit.target: 与 Range 进行比较的点到 Node 的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The offset is added before the depth test is performed and before the value is written into the depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量是在进行深度测试之前和将值写入深度缓冲区之前添加的。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the keyframe specified as a number between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive or null. This is equivalent to specifying start and end states in percentages in CSS stylesheets using @keyframes. If this value is null or missing, the keyframe will be evenly spaced between adjacent keyframes.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的偏移量，指定为 0.0 到 1.0 之间的一个数字，包括 null 或null。这等效于使用 @keyframes 在CSS样式表中以百分比指定开始和结束状态。如果此值为 null 或缺失，则关键帧将在相邻关键帧之间均匀间隔。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the keyframe specified as a number between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive or null. This is equivalent to specifying start and end states in percentages in CSS stylesheets using @keyframes. This will be null if the keyframe is automatically spaced using KeyframeEffect.spacing.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的偏移量，指定为 0.0 到 1.0 之间的一个数字，包括 null 或null。这等效于使用 @keyframes 在CSS样式表中以百分比指定开始和结束状态。如果使用 KeyframeEffect.spacing 自动分隔关键帧，则此参数将为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The offset position within node where the focus will be moved to. If not specified, the default value 0 is used.
trans-unit.target: 焦点将移动到的 node 内的偏移位置。如果未指定，则使用默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: The older navigator.getUserMedia() legacy API.
trans-unit.target: 旧的 navigator.getUserMedia() 旧版API。

trans-unit.source: The onanimationiteration event handler is then set up. It simply sets the box's animation-play-state to "paused", then updates the text displayed in the button to indicate that clicking the button will start playing the next iteration of theanimation.
trans-unit.target: 然后设置onanimationiteration事件处理程序。它只是将框的 animation-play-state 为“已暂停”，然后更新按钮中显示的文本，以指示单击按钮将开始播放动画的下一次迭代。

trans-unit.source: The one value that needs explaining is the vertical offset position we are drawing each bar at: HEIGHT-barHeight/2. I am doing this because I want each bar to stick up from the bottom of the canvas, not down from the top, as it would if we set the vertical position to 0. Therefore, we instead set the vertical position each time to the height of the canvas minus barHeight/2, so therefore each bar will be drawn from partway down the canvas, down to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 需要说明的一个值是我们在以下位置绘制每个条的垂直偏移位置： HEIGHT-barHeight/2 。之所以这样做，是因为我希望每个条都从画布的底部向上而不是从顶部向下，就像我们将垂直位置设置为0一样。因此，我们每次都将垂直位置设置为高度减去 barHeight/2 的值，因此每个条都将从画布的中途绘制到底部。

trans-unit.source: The only other primitive shapes are paths. A path is a list of points, connected by segments of lines that can be of different shapes, curved or not, of different width and of different color. A path, or even a subpath, can be closed. To make shapes using paths takes some extra steps:
trans-unit.target: 唯一的其他原始形状是路径。路径是由线段连接的点的列表，这些线段可以具有不同的形状（弯曲或不弯曲），不同的宽度和不同的颜色。路径甚至子路径都可以关闭。使用路径制作形状需要一些额外的步骤：

trans-unit.source: The only sequence which is not allowed within a CDATA section is the closing sequence of a CDATA section itself:
trans-unit.target: 唯一不允许在CDATA段中使用的序列是CDATA段本身的结束序列。

trans-unit.source: The only thing left is to look up the location of the aVertexNormal attribute and the uNormalMatrix uniform.
trans-unit.target: 剩下的唯一事情就是查找 aVertexNormal 属性和 uNormalMatrix 统一体的位置。

trans-unit.source: The only thing left to do is give the app a try: Check out the final demo here on Codepen.
trans-unit.target: 剩下要做的就是尝试一下该应用程序：在Codepen上查看最终的演示。

trans-unit.source: The only thing we do here is disable the "Connect" button when the local peer is connected and enable the "Disconnect" button when the remote peer connects.
trans-unit.target: 这里我们唯一要做的就是在本地对等体连接时禁用 "连接 "按钮,在远程对等体连接时启用 "断开 "按钮。

trans-unit.source: The only trouble we have now is that if the request doesn’t match anything in the cache, and the network is not available, our request will still fail. Let’s provide a default fallback so that whatever happens, the user will at least get something:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们唯一的麻烦是，如果请求与缓存中的任何内容都不匹配，并且网络不可用，我们的请求仍将失败。让我们提供一个默认的备用，这样无论发生什么情况，用户至少都会得到一些东西：

trans-unit.source: The only way to read content from a Blob is to use a FileReader. The following code reads the content of a Blob as a typed array.
trans-unit.target: 从Blob读取内容的唯一方法是使用 FileReader 。以下代码将Blob的内容读取为类型数组。

trans-unit.source: The opcode field defines how to interpret the payload data: 0x0 for continuation,0x1 for text (which is always encoded in UTF-8), 0x2 for binary, and other so-called "control codes" that will be discussed later. In this version of WebSockets, 0x3 to 0x7 and 0xB to 0xF have no meaning.
trans-unit.target: 操作码字段定义如何解释有效载荷数据：0x0表示连续， 0x1 表示文本（始终以UTF-8编码）， 0x2 表示二进制，以及其他所谓的“控制代码”，稍后将进行讨论。在此版本的WebSocket中， 0x3 至 0x7 和 0xB 至 0xF 没有意义。

trans-unit.source: The open request doesn't open the database or start the transaction right away. The call to the open() function returns an IDBOpenDBRequest object with a result (success) or error value that you handle as an event. Most other asynchronous functions in IndexedDB do the same thing - return an IDBRequest object with the result or error. The result for the open function is an instance of an IDBDatabase.
trans-unit.target: 打开请求不会立即打开数据库或启动事务。对 open() 函数的调用返回一个 IDBOpenDBRequest 对象，该对象带有您作为事件处理的结果（成功）或错误值。IndexedDB中的大多数其他异步函数执行相同的操作-返回带有结果或错误的 IDBRequest 对象。open函数的结果是 IDBDatabase. 的实例。

trans-unit.source: The operation by which reading and writing on a database is done. Every request represents one read or write operation.
trans-unit.target: 对数据库进行读写的操作。每一个请求代表一个读或写操作。

trans-unit.source: The operation cannot be performed on the current state of the interface object. For example, the state that was cached in an interface object has changed since it was last read from disk.
trans-unit.target: 不能对接口对象的当前状态进行操作。例如,自从上次从磁盘上读取接口对象的状态后,接口对象中缓存的状态就发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because no synthesis engine was available (For example, the user may need to install or configure a synthesis engine.)
trans-unit.target: 由于没有合成引擎,此时无法完成操作(例如,用户可能需要安装或配置合成引擎)。

trans-unit.source: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because some required network communication failed.
trans-unit.target: 由于一些所需的网络通信失败,此时操作无法完成。

trans-unit.source: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because the user-agent couldn't access the audio output device (for example, the user may need to correct this by closing another application.)
trans-unit.target: 此时操作无法完成,因为用户代理无法访问音频输出设备(例如,用户可能需要通过关闭其他应用程序来纠正)。
